message: Hi Bob, let's start with a 60/40 split.  It seems fair and gives us a good head start against inflation eating into the value.
I think a 55/45 split is a bit more balanced.  Let's get started dividing the money before it loses too much value!
Bob, I understand you want a larger share, but my offer is more reasonable. Let's settle this before inflation eats further into our potential gains.
